rules_text:
Flying, trample, break
When Gramps, Titan Mentor enters, surveil X where X is Gramps’ power, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand.
[i]Topple[/i] - When Gramps dies, if it’s not a token, you may exile it and remove a counter from you or a creature you control. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a 1/1.
